answers.answer: Craving iron is a sign of low iron. Anemia is more then that but if I were you I'd talk to your doc about how you're feeling and see what they say

Just check with your doctor and they'll do the proper tests... Depending on where you live or your daily schedule, it could be a vitamin D deficiency too or just a simple pregnancy symptom. You're muscles are working loads and carrying some extra weight, it's definitely normal!

Thanks for y'alls feedback! I just figured I might as well ask other mothers out there. I'll definitely be bringing this up to my doctor next time I see her. I live in southeast Texas so I dont think it's a vitamin d deficiency lol but we shall see

Sounds exactly like me and I'm anemic... If I don't take my iron tablets I get very weak, tired, dizzy and my heart starts to race.. when's the last time they did a blood test? I found out I had anemia when they took my blood for the gestational diabetes test at 26 weeks I'm now currently 34 weeks 3 days

question: So for the past couple of weeks or so I have been feeling super exhausted and tired. My limbs feel weak at times and I just don't want to do anything. I had also been craving ice which I hear is a sign of anemia. Im 32 weeks as of Saturday (tomorrow) and my doctor hasn't said anything about me being anemic yet which leads me to thinking maybe it's just a 3rd trimester symptom? Anybody else in the same boat or know what the answer is?
title: anemic or just symptoms?
